casebody.data:
Peter BUFFA and wife, Stacy Buffa
v.
CYGNATURE CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT, INC.; Granite Hardwoods, Inc.; The Hardwood Company; Windsor Window Company d/b/a Windsor Windows and Doors; Christopher Wotell; and Gary Sovel No. 46P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Daniel K. Bryson, Attorney at Law, Matthew E. Lee, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Buffa, Peter, et al. Patrick M. Wallace, Attorney at Law. Hannah Styron Symonds, Attorney at Law, for The Hardwood Company, et al. Wilson Elser, Attorney at Law. John I. Malone, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Windsor Window Company, et al. Michael P. North, Attorney at Law, Jeffrey M. Markowitz, Attorney and Counselor at law, for Windsor Windows And Doors (d/b/a). Paul E. Culpepper, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Cygnature Construction And Development, Inc., et al. M. Pierce Sandwith, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
